casebody.data:
ADCOX
v.
CLARKSON BROS. CONSTR. CO. No. 222P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 2, 2015. R. James Lore, Nicholas J. Dombalis, II, Raleigh, for Lore, R. James. Kari L. Schultz, Wilmington, M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Clarkson Brothers Construction Company, et. al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of July 2015 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of July 2015."
